user.title: Motion Lights Automation Setup - Basic Configuration
user.description: Configure the essential settings for your motion-activated lighting automation

data_description.name: A unique name for this motion lights automation instance
data_description.lights: The lights this automation should control
data_description.ambient_light_sensor: Sensor for ambient light detection (lux sensor with numeric value, or any sensor with binary state representation like on/off)
data_description.house_active: If set, affects brightness (ON=active brightness, OFF=inactive brightness)

advanced.title: Motion Lights Automation Setup - Advanced Options
advanced.description: Configure advanced settings and timing options

data_description.motion_activation: Enable automatic light control based on motion detection
data_description.motion_delay: Delay before turning on lights after motion detected (0-30 seconds)
data_description.extended_timeout: Time before lights turn off when manually controlled (300-7200 seconds)
data_description.no_motion_wait: Time to wait after motion stops before turning off lights (0-3600 seconds)
data_description.brightness_active: Brightness level when house is active (0-100%)
data_description.brightness_inactive: Brightness level when house is inactive (0-100%)
data_description.ambient_light_threshold: Lux threshold for ambient light detection (10-500 lux, ±20 lux hysteresis)
